name: Village Square
description: A lively crossroads ringed by cobbled stones and a moss-edged fountain. Roads splay to farms, trade stalls, and distant shrines.

exits.description: The packed-earth lane leading toward the northern gate.
A rutted track toward the southern farms.
Canvas awnings and crates mark the merchant row.
Sharp clangs and smoke drift from the forge.
Warm lantern light spills from the tavern arch.
Foot-worn path bending toward tilled soil.
A modest manor with a slate roof overlooks the square.
Low stone walls and herb beds fringe a quiet yard.

name: North Road
description: The lane narrows between clustered cottages. Farther ahead a timber gate frames the road; the square lies back to the south.

exits.description: Back toward the bustling square.
A short stretch to the wooden palisade gate.

name: North Gate
description: A simple palisade gate with watch planks overhead. Beyond, an overgrown path curls toward a crumbling shrine.

exits.description: Back down the village road.
A tufted trail leading to mossy stonework.

name: Old Hill Shrine
description: Weathered stones and lichen-crusted idols watch silently. Wildflowers reclaim the flagstones.

exits.description: Descend toward the village palisade.

name: Tavern Common Room
description: Low beams, roasted barley aroma, and a murmuring mix of travelers and locals. A hearth crackles at one end.

exits.description: Door swinging back to the square.
A side alley toward the merchant stalls.
Rear door opens onto the southern track.

name: Blacksmith Forge
description: Sparks leap from the open-sided forge. Racks of half-finished tools and a barrel of quenched blades sit nearby.

exits.description: Step back into the open square.
A dirt path edging along vegetable plots.
Stone steps up toward the walled garden.

name: Trading Post Row
description: Makeshift stalls, stacked crates, and a chalkboard of prices. Merchants haggle over grain and iron nails.

exits.description: Back toward the fountain hub.
Wheel tracks leading to tilled eastern fields.
A narrow lane between small cottages.
Covered walkway toward lantern light.

name: Herbalist Garden
description: Raised beds of pungent herbs within a low stone enclosure; glass jars and drying racks under a lean-to.

exits.description: Path sloping back to the square.
Steps down past stacked ore.
Gravel path to the manor door.

name: Manor House
description: A modest two-story hall with carved lintels. Ledgers and a faded banner hint at civic duties.

exits.description: Stone steps descending to the square.
Winding path among herb plots.

name: West Farm Plot
description: Furrows of root vegetables and a small shed buzzing with grain moths. Chickens scatter near rough fencing.

exits.description: Trail leading back to the square.
Path merging with the southern track.
Path to the ringing hammer blows.

name: South Road
description: A sun-warmed stretch bordered by low stone walls and carts laden with burlap sacks.

exits.description: Return to the central bustle.
Fields broaden toward distant hedgerows.
Wheel ruts veer toward western plots.
Dusty track bending past irrigation ditches.
Diagonal footpath skirting stacked hay.
Cut across to the merchant row.

name: Southern Farmstead
description: Broad tilled earth, scarecrow shadows, and a creaking windlass over a shallow well.

exits.description: Track back toward the village heart.

name: East Field Terraces
description: Tiered plots with young shoots, bordered by stacked stone and a lone elm tree.

exits.description: Cart path toward merchant stalls.
Follow the ruts to the main track.
Narrow lane between cottages.
